verbs.description: WASHINGTON — [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: says] [ARG1: his top economic adviser , Larry Kudlow , has suffered a heart attack] . Trump tweeted just minutes before his historic meeting with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un that Kudlow is being treated at Walter Reed Medical Center .
